titleStmt.title: Norfolk drollery, or, A compleat collection of the newest songs, jovial poems, and catches, &c. by the author, M. Stevenson.
titleStmt.author: Stevenson, Matthew, fl. 1654-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Reynolds ... and John Lutton ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Published earlier, 1665, with title: Poems; and later, 1685, with title: The wits, or, Poems & songs on various occasions.
